item.description:
PLEASE NOTE: THE DATE FOR THIS EVENT HAS BEEN CHANGED TO FEBRUARY 4TH...PLEASE JOIN US ON THIS NEW, UPDATED DAY...

Wanna feel like a kid again...then join us at Nomad's for a night of games, fun and laughs!

What is Nomad's, you ask? Well, Nomad's is huge play and adventure arcade and has plenty to keep you occupied. Take a look at what they offer....

pool tables, climbing wall, bumper cars, bouncing houses, mini bowling lanes, blacklight mini golf, basket ball arena, laser tag arena. video and electronic concourse, cafe and full bar.

All fun and adventure for those who can bear it. Come on out and join us...share the fun and laughs!!! It's free to enter, just pay for your play!

See you there...
item.how_to_find_us: My cell is 203-808-5829...will send out a meet up point.
item.why: we need to get out and add adventure to our lives!!!!!

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Feel Like A Kid Again @ NOMAD'S ADVENTURE QUEST...
